title: 428. The Simple Economics of Saving the Amazon Rain Forest
description: Everyone agrees that massive deforestation is an environmental disaster. But most of the standard solutions — scolding the Brazilians, invoking universal morality — ignore the one solution that might actually work
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
